EVJ.A: At X =49.2,the label with the highest density is {Loyalty Programs}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 40? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Loyalty Programs}'s peak at {56},{Product Quality}'s peak at {81},{Delivery Speed}'s peak at {85}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 61? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Loyalty Programs}'s peak at {56},{Personalization}'s peak at {13},{Product Range}'s peak at {10},{Customer Support}'s peak at {14},{Return Policies}'s peak at {11}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Product Range or Loyalty Programs?
NC.A: {Loyalty Programs} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Product Quality or Delivery Speed?
NC.A: {Delivery Speed} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Personalization or Loyalty Programs?
NC.A: {Loyalty Programs} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {3} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Customer Support}
